text: Jason Lowndes (14 December 1994 – 22 December 2017) was an Australian cyclist. He was born in Kalgoorlie, Western Australia. He rode professionally for Garneau–Québecor, Drapac Professional Cycling and Israel Cycling Academy teams. Lowndes died after being hit from behind by a car near Bendigo, Victoria at the age of 23. ==References== Category:1994 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Australian cyclists Category:Pedestrian road incident deaths Category:Sportspeople from Western Australia
title: Jason Lowndes
